description: The .NET Framework 4.8 Developer Pack lets developers build applications that target the .NET Framework 4.8 by using Visual Studio 2017, Visual Studio 2015 or other IDEs. This is a single package that bundles the .NET Framework 4.8, the .NET 4.8 Targeting Pack, and the .NET Framework 4.8 SDK.
summary: The .NET Framework 4.8 Developer Pack lets developers build applications that target the .NET Framework 4.8.
author: Microsoft
